question: 散歩する
sourceAnswer: To Go For A Walk, To Go For A Stroll
sourceMnemonic: <ja>散歩</ja> is "a walk." Make that into a verb and you have <vocabulary>to go for a walk</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to go for a stroll</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. It will help to know <ja>散歩</ja> as well.
